code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useMaintenance}from'../context/MaintenanceContext';import'../styles/MaintenanceRequest.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MaintenanceRequest=()=>{const[newRequest,setNewRequest]=useState('');const{requests,addRequest}=useMaintenance();const handleSubmitRequest=()=>{if(newRequest){addRequest(newRequest);setNewRequest('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"maintenance-request-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Maintenance Requests"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Issue"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:requests.map(request=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:request.issue}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:request.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:request.status})]},request.id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"submit-request",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter issue description",value:newRequest,onChange:e=>setNewRequest(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmitRequest,children:"Submit"})]})]});};export default MaintenanceRequest;
